channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5913|2024-09-04T13:53:22.231Z -- opentext -- fortify%20scancentral%20dast
item.description: Incorrect Privilege Assignment vulnerability in opentext Fortify ScanCentral DAST. The vulnerability could be exploited to gain elevated privileges.This issue affects Fortify ScanCentral DAST versions 21.1, 21.2, 21.2.1, 22.1, 22.1.1, 22.2, 23.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-4554|2024-08-28T06:27:31.937Z -- opentext -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Access Manager leads to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack. This issue affects NetIQ Access Manager before 5.0.4.1 and 5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-4555|2024-08-28T06:27:21.348Z -- opentext -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Access Manager allows user account impersonation in specific scenario. This issue affects NetIQ Access Manager before 5.0.4.1 and before 5.1

item.title: CVE-2024-4556|2024-08-28T06:27:07.990Z -- opentext -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Access Manager allows access the sensitive information. This issue affects NetIQ Access Manager before 5.0.4 and before 5.1.

item.title: CVE-2021-38122|2024-08-28T06:28:29.654Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerable identified in NetIQ Advance Authentication that impacts the server functionality and disclose sensitive information. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-38121|2024-08-28T06:28:43.452Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: Insufficient or weak TLS protocol version identified in Advance authentication client server communication when specific service is accessed between devices. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication versions before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-22509|2024-08-28T06:29:42.838Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A vulnerability identified in storing and reusing information in Advance Authentication. This issue can lead to leakage of sensitive data to unauthorized user. The issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-22530|2024-08-28T06:29:20.166Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A vulnerability identified in NetIQ Advance Authentication that doesn't enforce account lockout when brute force attack is performed on API based login. This issue may lead to user account compromise if successful or may impact server performance. This issue impacts all NetIQ Advance Authentication before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-22529|2024-08-28T06:29:33.325Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A vulnerability identified in NetIQ Advance Authentication that leaks sensitive server information. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication version before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-38120|2024-08-28T06:28:55.684Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A vulnerability identified in Advance Authentication that allows bash command Injection in administrative controlled functionality of backup due to improper handling in provided command parameters. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication version before 6.3.5.1.

item.title: CVE-2020-11847|2024-08-22T13:50:29.679Z -- opentext -- privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: SSH authenticated user when access the PAM server can execute an OS command to gain the full system access using bash. This issue affects Privileged Access Manager before 3.7.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2022-26327|2024-08-21T15:54:45.246Z -- opentext -- performance%20center
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in OpenText Performance Center on Windows allows Retrieve Embedded Sensitive Data.This issue affects Performance Center: 12.63.

item.title: CVE-2022-26328|2024-08-21T15:25:44.789Z -- opentext -- performance%20center
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in OpenText Performance Center on Windows allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Performance Center: 12.63.

item.title: CVE-2020-11846|2024-08-21T13:37:11.454Z -- opentext -- privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability found in OpenText Privileged Access Manager that issues a token. on successful issuance of the token, a cookie gets set that allows unrestricted access to all the application resources. This issue affects Privileged Access Manager before 3.7.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2020-11850|2024-08-21T13:37:05.195Z -- opentext -- self%20service%20password%20reset
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in OpenText Self Service Password Reset allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). This issue affects Self Service Password Reset before 4.5.0.2 and 4.4.0.6

item.title: CVE-2020-11847|2024-08-21T13:38:44.228Z -- opentext -- privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: SSH authenticated user when access the PAM server can execute an OS command to gain the full system access using bash. This issue affects Privileged Access Manager before 3.7.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2021-22508|2024-08-15T15:22:04.128Z -- opentext -- operations%20bridge%20reporter
item.description: A potential vulnerability has been identified for OpenText Operations Bridge Reporter. The vulnerability could be exploited to inject malicious SQL queries. An attack requires to be an authenticated administrator of OBR with network access to the OBR web application.

item.title: CVE-2023-7249|2024-08-12T16:26:51.063Z -- opentext -- opentext%20directory%20services
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in OpenText OpenText Directory Services allows Path Traversal.This issue affects OpenText Directory Services: from 16.4.2 before 24.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-6357|2024-08-06T14:22:10.514Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20intelligence
item.description: Insecure Direct Object Reference vulnerability identified in OpenText ArcSight Intelligence.

item.title: CVE-2024-1147|2024-08-05T16:39:51.291Z -- opentext -- pvcs%20version%20manager
item.description: Weak access control in OpenText PVCS Version Manager allows potential bypassing of authentication and download of files.

item.title: CVE-2020-11843|2024-08-04T11:42:00.107Z -- opentext -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: This allows the information exposure to unauthorized users. This issue affects NetIQ Access Manager using version 4.5 or before

item.title: CVE-2020-11862|2024-08-04T11:42:00.786Z -- opentext -- netiq%20privileged%20account%20manager
item.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Privileged Account Manager on Linux, Windows, 64 bit allows Flooding.This issue affects NetIQ Privileged Account Manager: before 3.7.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-7248|2024-08-02T08:57:35.093Z -- opentext -- vertica%20management%20console
item.description:
Certain functionality in OpenText Vertica Management console might be prone to bypass via crafted requests.
The vulnerability would affect one of Vertica’s authentication functionalities by allowing specially crafted requests and sequences. This issue impacts the following Vertica Management Console versions: 10.x 11.1.1-24 or lower 12.0.4-18 or lower
Please upgrade to one of the following Vertica Management Console versions: 10.x to upgrade to latest versions from below. 11.1.1-25 12.0.4-19 23.x 24.x

item.title: CVE-2023-7240|2024-08-02T08:57:35.206Z -- opentext -- netiq%20identity%20console
item.description: An improper authorization level has been detected in the login panel. It may lead to unauthenticated Server Side Request Forgery and allows to perform open services enumeration. Server makes query to provided server (Server IP/DNS field) and is triggering connection to arbitrary address.

item.title: CVE-2024-7050|2024-08-01T21:45:38.396Z -- opentext -- opentext%20directory%20services
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in OpenText OpenText Directory Services may allow Multi-factor Authentication Bypass in particular scenarios.This issue affects OpenText Directory Services: 24.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-5202|2024-08-01T21:03:11.078Z -- opentext -- dimensions%20rm
item.description: Arbitrary File Read in OpenText Dimensions RM allows authenticated users to read files stored on the server via webservices

item.title: CVE-2024-5201|2024-08-01T21:03:11.090Z -- opentext -- dimensions%20rm
item.description: Privilege Escalation in OpenText Dimensions RM allows an authenticated user to escalate there privilege to the privilege of another user via HTTP Request

item.title: CVE-2024-2834|2024-08-01T19:25:42.096Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Management Center and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-2835|2024-08-01T19:25:41.903Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20enterprise%20security%20manager
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-7050|2024-07-26T15:14:57.182Z -- opentext -- opentext%20directory%20services
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in OpenText OpenText Directory Services may allow Multi-factor Authentication Bypass in particular scenarios.This issue affects OpenText Directory Services: 24.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-3483|2024-07-23T16:33:37.197Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Remote Code Execution has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability can trigger command injection and insecure deserialization issues.

item.title: CVE-2020-25836|2024-07-16T21:38:15.638Z -- opentext -- netiq%20directory%20and%20resource%20administrator
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Access vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator. This issue affects NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator versions prior to 10.0.2 and prior to 9.2.1 Patch 10.

item.title: CVE-2024-4190|2024-06-12T17:40:25.580Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20logger
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities have been identified in OpenText ArcSight Logger. The vulnerabilities could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-2834|2024-04-08T12:22:49.221Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Management Center and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-2835|2024-06-04T17:30:45.653Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20enterprise%20security%20manager
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-3968|2024-06-04T17:30:57.193Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Remote Code Execution has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability can trigger remote code execution using custom file upload task.

item.title: CVE-2024-3483|2024-05-15T16:44:00.950Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Remote Code Execution has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability can trigger command injection and insecure deserialization issues.

item.title: CVE-2024-3482|2024-06-04T17:31:32.548Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20enterprise%20security%20manager
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-3969|2024-05-28T14:38:06.307Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: XML External Entity injection vulnerability found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to remote code execution by parsing untrusted XML payload

item.title: CVE-2024-3485|2024-06-06T19:15:16.126Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Server Side Request Forgery vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to senstive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-3484|2024-06-04T17:32:01.210Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Path Traversal found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This can lead to privilege escalation or file disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-3488|2024-06-04T17:32:09.909Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: File Upload vulnerability in unauthenticated session found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability could allow ant attacker to upload a file without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-3487|2024-06-04T17:32:27.292Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Broken Authentication vulnerability discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This vulnerability allows an attacker to manipulate certain parameters to bypass authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-3486|2024-06-04T17:32:32.174Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: XML External Entity injection vulnerability found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to information disclosure and remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-3970|2024-06-04T17:33:01.177Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Server Side Request Forgery vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to senstive information disclosure by directory traversal.

item.title: CVE-2024-3967|2024-06-04T17:33:08.632Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Remote Code Execution has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability can trigger remote code execution unisng unsafe java object deserialization.

item.title: CVE-2024-4429|2024-06-04T17:53:02.854Z -- opentext -- imanager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-4190|2024-06-11T17:48:21.272Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20logger
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities have been identified in OpenText ArcSight Logger. The vulnerabilities could be remotely exploited.

item.description: Weak access control in OpenText PVCS Version Manager allows potential bypassing of authentication and uploading of files.

item.title: CVE-2024-1811|2024-03-20T12:38:40.702Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20platform
item.description: A potential vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-1973|2024-03-25T21:27:43.774Z -- opentext -- secure%20content%20manager
item.description: By leveraging the vulnerability, lower-privileged users of Content Manager can manipulate Content Manager clients to elevate privileges and perform unauthorized operations.

The vulnerability would affect one of Vertica’s authentication functionalities by allowing specially crafted requests and sequences. This issue impacts the following Vertica Management Console versions: 10.x 11.1.1-24 or lower 12.0.4-18 or lower
Please upgrade to one of the following Vertica Management Console versions: 10.x to upgrade to latest versions from below. 11.1.1-25 12.0.4-19 23.x 24.x

item.description: CWE-1385 vulnerability in OpenText Documentum D2 affecting versions16.5.1 to CE 23.2. The vulnerability could allow upload arbitrary code and execute it on the client's computer.

item.description: A vulnerability identified in Advance Authentication that allows bash command Injection in administrative controlled functionality of backup due to improper handling in provided command parameters. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication version before 6.3.5.1.

item.title: CVE-2021-22529|2024-08-28T13:31:13.264Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A vulnerability identified in NetIQ Advance Authentication that leaks sensitive server information. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication version before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-22530|2024-08-28T13:31:54.122Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A vulnerability identified in NetIQ Advance Authentication that doesn't enforce account lockout when brute force attack is performed on API based login. This issue may lead to user account compromise if successful or may impact server performance. This issue impacts all NetIQ Advance Authentication before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-22509|2024-08-28T13:31:40.778Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A vulnerability identified in storing and reusing information in Advance Authentication. This issue can lead to leakage of sensitive data to unauthorized user. The issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-38121|2024-08-28T13:29:45.226Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: Insufficient or weak TLS protocol version identified in Advance authentication client server communication when specific service is accessed between devices. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication versions before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2021-38122|2024-08-28T13:32:46.172Z -- opentext -- netiq%20advance%20authentication
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerable identified in NetIQ Advance Authentication that impacts the server functionality and disclose sensitive information. This issue affects NetIQ Advance Authentication before 6.3.5.1

item.title: CVE-2024-4556|2024-08-28T13:27:43.754Z -- opentext -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Access Manager allows access the sensitive information. This issue affects NetIQ Access Manager before 5.0.4 and before 5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-4555|2024-08-28T13:27:19.829Z -- opentext -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Access Manager allows user account impersonation in specific scenario. This issue affects NetIQ Access Manager before 5.0.4.1 and before 5.1

item.title: CVE-2024-4554|2024-08-28T13:28:23.065Z -- opentext -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Access Manager leads to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack. This issue affects NetIQ Access Manager before 5.0.4.1 and 5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-2834|2024-08-29T19:12:40.109Z -- opentext -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Management Center and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.
